She was literally my guardian angel towards the VA to get me seen. At one point, I even offered to pay the costs and "argue" with the VA on my own. She refused to let me pay out of pocket expenses for my visit because I was a veteran. I was so touched by her help and determination. Unfotunately, I don't know her name, but because of her kindness, I will always give this clinic high reviews to anyone who listens. To that receptionist: YOU ROCK and THANK YOU!!!

name: Melissa Scofield
text: They do a great job!  Very nice staff and they know what they’re doing. Highly recommend.

name: Taylor Boston
text: I have visited this facility a couple different times, and overall have had a good experience every time. I went yesterday and saw the NP, who is always great. I left very pleased, and even got on and left a good review. Today, I retract that good review. I understand they are busy, and it’s a crazy time. Yet, things were told to me by the front desk on the phone on one call, and then I was told “I am putting words in her mouth” and had a nice little argument on a separate call. I will not put the whole situation on here, unnecessary, but I just am not pleased with what happened. I work in healthcare, and usually do not complain about bad experiences, because everyone has bad days. Just felt like something needed to be said.

resp.text: Taylor, we regret you had a negative experience while in our care, especially after several good ones. We strive to ensure every patient receives an exceptional experience, every time. We appreciate your feedback as we would like to address your concerns and improve where we can. Please contact us directly at info@hhurgentcare.org to discuss your experience further.

name: Sandra B
text: Very friendly staff! My in and out time was amazing.... shortest visit I\'ve ever had while getting excellent care. Would highly recommend

name: Michael Charpentier
text: Fast and efficient. No hassle health-care. An oasis in the maze of finding quality care. Thank you Courtney 😊

name: John kyler
text: Here I was delivering to a local business. Started rushing around to get things done because it was Friday evening and I didn't want anyone to stay longer than needed. Welp it ended up that I got a nasty injury on a finger. The crew at Huntsville got me right in and had me fixed up good. The staff was very professional, caring and friendly. Whether it's a dust storm or a virus. They got it covered!

resp.text:
John,
We are sorry you hurt yourself but glad we were able to get you taken care of. Thanks for choosing us and thanks for the great review!

name: Kendal Crowell
text: I have always hated going to the doctor, however, the office staff and the practitioner, Courtney, made me feel so comfortable and welcome. They took good care of me and made COVID-19 testing not bad at all. I will definitely be coming back here when I need healthcare in the future.

resp.text: Thanks for your feedback and 5-star review! We appreciate it.

name: Baron C
text: Extremely friendly, professional and courteous staff. The entire staff was very knowledgeable and made my visit quick and easy.

resp.text: Thank you for the review.

name: Bill Beard
text: Very poor service.  I pre-set an oppointment for 9:45, I arrived early and waited for over 3 hours to see a nurse.  I will never come here again.

resp.text:
Bill,
We are sorry you did not have a good experience due to the extensive wait at our center. We appreciate feedback and use it to improve where we can. Please contact us directly at: info@hhurgentcare.org and someone will reach out to you shortly.

name: Rachel Walls
text: From the super friendly office staff to the amazing Nurse practitioner I had a wonderful experience.  I love the way they are constantly spraying Lysol to help with the spread of germs!!  Nurse Practitioner, Erica Hogeland was awesome. She is easy to talk to and very knowledgeable of my condition. I will defiantly recommend them to my family and friends!

resp.text: Thanks for this great review and recommendation. We are here to help!

name: JulieAnnShultz
text: The staff was so sweet with our 2 year old today. It was 15 minutes until closing and we came in with a broken arm. They took their time and gave her the best care! 100% recommend this clinic!

resp.text: Thanks

name: Tracy
text: The NP and other staff provided quick and competent care . I will definitely return for any urgent care needs

resp.text: Thanks!

name: Ella Cannon
text: The ladies who took care of me were super nice and professional. If you ever need blood work done go here and ask for Haley. I have always feared getting my blood drawn but I barley felt it at all!!! Thanks ladies for being so awesome.

name: Laurie Lane
text: This place is great! I cannot stand going to the doctor. The staff here is super friendly and helpful. The facilities are clean and modern. Highly recommend!

resp.text: We appreciate your business and thank you for leaving a 5-star review. Come back and see us when you need to.

name: Chad Thompson
text: Absolutely Amazing Experience! Super Friendly Receptionist, The Nurse Practitioner Was Excellent! Made us feel cared about, and like a family oriented atmosphere! Highly Recommended!!

resp.text: Thanks so much for your recommendation and great review!

name: Katie Holt
text: Unfortunately we have had to visit this urgent care several times since Christmas because of sickness, but I wouldn't dare go anywhere else in the Shoals when we need a quick visit. Everyone I have met on their staff is very friendly and helpful.  Ms. Pennington, CRNP is my favorite to see. She is very nice and seems to be genuinely concerned about our health.

resp.text: Thank you for the review. We are glad we've been able to help.

name: Morgan McCullar
text:
The best advice I can give is DO NOT go here. I went in this morning because I had a sore throat and runny nose. I simply wanted to be tested for flu or strep before I returned to work. They did not take my temperature or anything, but asked me if I had been to China. When I responded that I had recently been to Europe (not China), the doctor came out and said, “I will not see you. You need to leave”.
She made me feel like a freak and she did not treat me like a fellow human being. I asked, “you won’t even test me for flu?”  And she said, “no, you need to go to the ER. This is serious.”
I went to another doctor’s office and it turns out I have a sinus infection. These people should be ashamed of the way they treat patients. I went there for help and I was turned away very rudely.

resp.text:
Morgan,
We apologize for your experience at our center. There is a protocol for international travel and we do not turn away patients that need care. This situation is being addressed and handled by management. If you would like to discuss further, you may contact us at: info@urgentteam.com.

name: Dee Rachela Houston
text: Always wonderful from the moment you walk in until you leave. Truly a wonderful staff! Even my kids love to come because they have a kid friendly table and crayons w printouts. Above and beyond and the medical team here is superb!

name: Captain Krunch
text: Took my insurance card, charged me a 10 dollar co pay. 3 weeks down the road I received a bill for the full amount. I seen a similar review of this here and had I known this was going to happen then i just would have left. Seems pretty shady to me.

resp.text:
Sorry for the delayed response. Our centers offer a safe credit card payment option called Secure Pay. The front desk should have made you aware of this as it provides a convenient and secure method for you to pay your insurance deductible and coinsurance prior to service. Additionally, your credit card will be used to pay any remaining balances your insurance does not cover.

After your visit, we submit your medical claim to your insurance company for the services provided. Once your insurance company pays its contracted portion, you will receive a statement in the mail explaining the portion your insurance paid and what (if any) balance is your responsibility. You will then have 14 days from the statement date to either arrange for another method of payment or request more information regarding the bill. If we have not received payment after 14 days, Secure Pay will charge your credit card for the balance due.

If you would like to discuss further, please email your contact information to: info@urgentteam.com and someone will reach out shortly.

name: Em
text: Wait time was minimal but I was misdiagnosed. I was told sinus infection but I actually have shingles that spread to my eye.  I was very clear with my complaints/symptoms, but was still misdiagnosed. (I didn't know it at the time, but all the symptoms I had basically screamed shingles infection.)  You'd think if I'm capable of googling this, a nurse practitioner would have certainly recognized the symptoms and learned about it in school. 🤷🏻‍♀️  She was actually kind of rude, didn't listen to me (obviously) and seemed more concerned with the little brown flecks I have in my irises. Seriously?! I was given antibiotics but should have gotten an antiviral medicine. Timing is crucial with this, and since I didn’t start the medicine in a timely manner, it’s going to take twice as long to heal, and I could lose vision in my eye. This place is probably okay for kids ear infections, bronchitis, etc., but that’s it. I won’t be going back.

name: Destinee Barnes
text: This facility refused to see a patient that had a fever of 101.3 and is 6 weeks pregnant. Told I would have to come back the next morning at 8am. It was 4:30 and they didn’t close until 5.

resp.text: We are sorry we were unable to help you at our center recently. While we take walk-ins, we also encourage the use of our online scheduling to avoid long waits. Unfortunately, due to unprecedented volumes, some centers may reach maximum capacity before the end of posted hours. When this occurs, it is necessary for the center to stop additional registration/check-ins for the remainder of the day. We are making ongoing refinements to meet the community's need for services during the pandemic and keep everyone safe, and apologize if this happened when you needed to see one of our healthcare providers.

name: Lisa Green
text: Had to carry my son in on friday August 17,2019. He had been stung on his face by an unknown bee/wasp. His face had began to swell as well as his eyes swelling shut. I knew we didn't have much time. He was seen immediately and treated with the best care possible. Everyone there was amazing and very professional. Big shout out to the entire staff and a special thank u for calling to check on Alex today. ❤❤❤

name: Brittney Shupe
text: I have been here several times. The staff is friendly and knowledgeable. The wait time has never been very long

resp.text: Thanks Brittney

name: Aaron Page
text: Front Clerk was excellent as well as all other support staff. Quick, Efficient, Friendly!

resp.text: Thanks

name: Mercedes Alexander
text: The CRNP and the black nurse where amazing they both were sweet and understanding . My issue is with the receptionist she has ZERO personality and was kind of rude. I would go back because I received good care but I think they should hire more personable office assistants.

name: Breanna Prestage
text: Super fast visit in and out ! Everyone was super friendly and very caring.  I would highly reccomend urgent team in muscle shoals !

name: Archantia Whiteside
text: The Receptionist Is Rude , Didn’t Smile Not Once At Anyone Who Came In Interrupts You ,  While Thinking She Knows Everything Do Better Please Ma’am But Other Than That Great Place And The Nurse Was Sweet And Caring .

name: jaidah riboldi
text: This place is amazing they are totally kid friendly and they have really nice service and will take care of your every need

resp.text: Thank you! Glad we could help!

name: Hunter Barnett
text: Was in and out in 30 mins. Got me taken care of. Much faster and better than Med Plus.

resp.text: Thank you Hunter

name: Kimberley Powell
text: When your sick, you don’t want to get out in public much less wait anywhere and I was in and out here within 30 minutes. Very friendly staff and super clean place! Highly recommended!

name: Dusty McCain
text: Quick friendly knowledgeable staff! Would definitely recommend going here.

resp.text: Thanks Dusty!

name: Jon Cannon
text: They really care about you and your need. Great Medical Treatment. Thanks!!!

resp.text: Thanks

name: Lee Watkins
text:
Positives - Facility is clean. Very little wait time. Staff is friendly. CRNP Erica is thorough and friendly.

Negatives - CRNP Laura is rude. Interrupts. Doesn’t listen. Also brought teenage child in with flu A and cough. They can’t prescribe anything stronger than over the counter. So don’t waste time or money unless you need them to help you pick out an over the counter med. Go to your medical doctor. So I gave it a 1 star as the visit was unproductive and wish I’d waited 12 hours until our pediatrician opened.

resp.text:
Lee,
We are sorry you had this experience at our center. With the flu, the only prescription given is for anti-virals (Tamiflu, and the brand new Xofluza) IF given within the first 48 hours since symptoms first came on. We are more than happy to discuss your treatment (and your son's) further -- if you'd like to send your contact email/phone number directly to: info@urgentteam.com someone will reach out to you shortly.

name: Maria Strickland
text: Came in 10 mins before closing my husband had poison oak and they took him in with no problem. Very friendly people and was in and out quickly.

resp.text:
Maria,
Thanks for your review, we appreciate your feedback. Glad we were able to help.

name: Patrick Oliver
text: Great staff , fast, super friendly and great care everytime !

resp.text: Happy to oblige!

name: Cody Braly
text: Haley, Sherka, and Nataline provided very great, fast, and professional service.

resp.text: Thanks

name: Reyaires Anderson
text: Very friendly staff, clean facilities, always very helpful. Wait time is little to none and the nurses are always caring to each situation you may have.

resp.text:
Reyaires,
Thanks for the 5-star review. We appreciate it. We are glad you had a good experience and hope you rely on us in the future to help take care of you.

name: Gee Connson
text: I used these people once, your best advice is if you are reading this and your name has not been called yet leave and go to some where down the street.

name: Brandon Staggs
text: They charged my insurance company $409 for a a 5 minute office visit that included no lab work or anything. It’s a scam.

resp.text:
Brandon,
Unfortunately there is an after hours fee that is billed (to some insurances) for hours outside of regular office hours. If you wish to discuss further and see your cost breakdown, please contact us directly at: info@urgentteam.com

name: Charlotte Chamberlain
text: Super nice staff..It didn't take long. Fast diagnosis ..Thanks for helping me today.

name: Rhonda Mannon
text: Super friendly and caring staff. Love them here!

name: Jaz N
text: Usually no long wait. Always friendly and helpful. My kids and I have been here multiple times.

name: Dar Spe
text: Everything was fine as I signed in to see the dr. They took my insurance card and charged my copay but a couple weeks down the road I received a bill for the entire amount. I found out later they dont take my insurance. There was no mention to me of this or I would have left. Now I owe over 120$ because of it. I won't go back that's for sure. I have a very well known insurance ot would have paid but now I'm stuck with a bill.

name: Kimberly Osborne
text: I had to wait 40 minutes to see anybody. There was only 2 people in front of me. The nurse told me i tested positive for the flu but are thought it was alloy gone so she didn't give me a prescription for it. Needless to say I'm worse Rossi than yesterday andI feel I waisted my money going here. The receptionist let me stand there for 10 minutes after I see the nurse waiting for a paper to take to my job.

resp.text: Kimberly, We are sorry you’ve had this experience at our center. And sorry you are not feeling well. We would appreciate the opportunity to follow up directly with you. Please email your name and email address and/or phone number to info@urgentteam.com and a center manager will reach out to you shortly to discuss. Thank you.

name: ANTOINE Robinson
text: Best Urgent Care clinic in the area !!!! Hands down!!

resp.text: Thanks Antoine!

name: Kellie Calderon
text: Great service. Modern

name: Stitchedbyyoshi
text: Great timing and staff was profesional

name: Linda Hudson
text: Friendly, professional staff, very clean facility!

name: Renee Martin
text: Left my real name, Birthdate, and phone number a week ago for a prescription refill question. Got the run around. Transferred to scottsboro and back. No one ever called. So I call again today and they won’t do a teledoc appointment when I’ve been on this same medicine for over 2 yrs. probably closer to 3 yrs.

name: Dean Yadda
text: I have been there numerous times.  All staff are very nice and helpful.  I personally wouldn't go anywhere else unless i had to.

name: C B
text: Been here twice and they are so nice and caring! Get you in and out so fast! Best in scottsboro by far!!

name: Nathan Jenkins
text: Very nice folks!

name: Tee West
text: Staff was very nice and helpful, would definitely recommend to anyone

name: Kelly Troglen
text: very professional very quick!!

name: Aby Music
text: Wouldnt go back, staff was nice but the actual doctor seemed impatient and scared to even go through the routine of checking me. Unprofessional 💯 and waste of my time and money . Shouldve went somewhere else

name: Darryl Copeland
text: Firstly, the staff here is phenomenal! They go above and beyond to ensure that you are getting the very best care. I recently received my COVID vaccine and Barbara Lynn was so knowledgeable concerning what to expect once I receive the injection. She made sure I had contact number and told me to call any time of the day. When you find a place where strangers care about you then you adopt them as a provider! I am so thankful.

name: Tabitha Mathis
text: My daughter busted her knee open falling on a rock, I took her southern immediate care in Anniston, every one of their staff members were amazing, so friendly and polite and so sweet to my baby. She was terrified of getting stitches for the 1st time, they explained everything to her and were compassionate about treating her. Thank you guys for all that you do! I will refer anyone to you! I will definitely go back for further needs.

name: Renee Mondragon
text: My doctor is great and all but her staff can never send my prescription to the right pharmacy.

name: shayla millwood
text: I absolutely love Southern Immediate Care. Everyone is super friendly, cares about their patients, and are very well educated. I always have a good experience and I will always go here when I can!

name: Matt Britton
text: 3 out of 10 patients confronted the nurses about the terrible wait time. Some poor baby crying for over an hour since we went back We were about to leave ourselves. Its hot & no usable cell signal

name: Beth Ferguson
text: Every time I go to this urgent care center the staff is so friendly and quick. It can take a minute to get back, but once they get you back they are already prepared to give you whatever tests you need.

name: Heather Woodard
text: Do not waste your time. Just go to your primary care Dr. Or the ER.

name: Tiffany Haynes
text: The staff is wonderful except for one dr, she is very rude and has no bedside manner at all! Worst experience ever. And I have been going to them for years. Looks like the lost a loyal patient....

name: Carrie Wilson
text: The communication between the doctor, nurses and front desk staff is very poor here. I was very frustrated after my visit having not had my questions answered.

name: Andrew Robinson
text: Let me start this review by saying that there is only one reason that I’m giving 5 stars, and that is because of Tara. My wife and I were traveling to another country and had to have detailed information on a Covid test. We were very specific with what we needed when we were being tested and assured that we would receive this. When we went to pick up our results on Friday, 9/18, we were handed a document that I could have created on Microsoft Word with a faded letter head. When we asked about what we were told being included, the office staff acted incredibly put out and irritated about our request. They hand wrote all of the information on the incredibly unprofessional document and said that was the best they could do. I went back to the office the next day where I found Tara at the front desk. After explaining our situation, Tara empathetically addresses the situation and provided me with the exact document that we had to provide to customs for our trip. I was in the office for less than 5 minutes and got exactly what I needed. Why this required two trips is confusing, but if not for Tara, we would have missed our deadline for travel approval, all because of the laziness and lack of customer service we received from the staff present on 9/18, including the assistant manager. Tara was by far the most professional employee we dealt with from multiple phone calls, to 3 visits at Southern Immediate Care in Anniston. My 5 stars are for Tara.

name: Sheria Perkins
text: My daughter is sick and has to get a COVID test and has been waiting nearly or at least 3 hrs. to be seen.  Ridiculous.  They need to have more people working. This place is so so so slow!!!

name: Allie Taylor
text: They had the worst communication ever. I went for a simple COVID test and had gotten one at this same location before. I was in and out the first time. This time I got the test within 30 minutes then was told to wait for the doctor whatever reason because they do NOT do rapid testing at this location. Therefore I waited 3 HOURS for her to walk in and tell me that she would call me. No communication between front desk, nurses, and doctor. WORST experience I’ve had at an “immediate” care place in a my entire life. Wasted my entire day and plans because lack of communication. I highly do NOT recommend coming here for COVID testing or if you have a serious illness or emergency.

name: Boney Mahoney
text: Dont waste your time or money with this place, there very slow, they dont  communicate well between nurses, dr., front desk. Ive had 3 different bad experiences with this location, last time they didnt call the  prescription in, huge ordeal!  And this time they didn't spell my daughter's name correct when they sent it in, an the pharmacy wouldnt give the medication to us.Just frustrating! Won't be back

name: Rachel Lâm
text: Staff was extremely helpful and nice. Especially Ms. Monica (front desk), Ms. Kayla (nurse practitioner) and Ms. Deaundra. They were all so sweet and did a great job!

name: Erica Williams
text: As always I'm leaving happy. Was scared from all the recent reviews I've seen, but I'm pleased. Walked in at 8am was called back by 8:10. Was given my test at 8:30, Dr. came in at 8:40 and I'm now in the car at 8:55. Great staff!

name: Bradley Wagner
text: Wait 2hrs to get in for a covid test, it is not even a rapid test as exclaimed online, not very busy either and good luck getting someone to answer the phone for your covid results when they even told you to call at said time to hear it. Do not waste your time nor money going here. Better off driving 20+ min elsewhere.

name: Laura Lee Bowman
text: They have the sweetest staff of any doctor’s office I have been to! I highly recommend them!!

name: Devan Patel
text: This place is a ripoff cause they told me that I have to have a referral so I sent one and they didn’t say I need a referral per person and now I have to pay out of me pocket and they said it was miscommunication that’s how this place make money is not telling you that you need a referral per a person and I had went with my wife to get a COVID test.

name: Heather Arnold
text: They never answer their phones.  If they do they stick you on hold so long you get the answering service. Very unprofessional front office staff.

name: charlotte fulton
text: I don’t know why it’s called “Immediate” care...that is a joke.  Called to get a Covid test and was told “walk in” only,,,couldn’t make an appt. We were told be there by 630pm as they close at 8pm.  We drove 45 min to get here.   We’ve been here 3 hours  in the car the entire time. No wonder Covid is everywhere!  We would not have come here had we known!  There is no update...no idea when we will be seen.  The only reason I gave this place 1 star is because  a 0 was not an option.  Will NEVER make this mistake again.  Abysmal service!

name: Joseph Conder
text: Went for a covid test. Got a quick test and everything went smooth, then I found out they billed my insurance almost $3000 and now they're sending me a $60 bill in the mail after I paid my copay already....

name: Myra Wilborn
text: Dr and Staff were so courteous and thorough...I use them when my Dr is closed and I've always been treated very good...I will always go here when I need after hours care...

name: Mary T
text:
I went there on a Saturday around 11am. I had had a fever of 102, vomiting, extreme diarrhea, and severe headache for more than 2 days. All I wanted was a COVID test to make sure that wasn't what it was.

Nope. Was told I had to see the dr and to go sit in my car. 2 hours later, we called the desk because we STILL had not been called back. I guess they had forgotten about me because 10 minutes later I was in a room.

Then I waited in the room over an hour. Was told only 1 doctor acheduled for ALL the patients for the day. I finally asked them if I could go lay in my car, as I was feeling so sick. Lo and behold, they said I was the next patient the dr was going to see.

The entire staff is really nice and caring there ... they are just horribly overworked and understaffed.

Today is day 8 since I went and I am FINALLY feeling better. But had I needed a return visit, I would have gone somewhere else. That is just too long of a wait for sick people!

name: Juliana Renfroe
text: Friendly staff and super quick services (before covid 19), they tested my husband for covid and though there was a long wait they did keep us updated and continued to keep us comfortable and safe.

name: Jessica H
text: Went for a COVID test that had to be done by a certain time. Let the front desk know what we were there for 3 times. The test took all of 30 seconds after waiting for almost 2 hours. The nurse said had she "known what we were there for" we wouldn't have been stuck as long. Obvious communication issues in the office, the name is extremely misleading when the average wait time is 4 hours. Do yourself a favor and find anywhere else.

name: tena clay
text: Very friendly staff. The doctor was very patient and knowledgeable.  He explained everything I needed to know in great detail.

name: Tybias Eubanks
text: Waited for FOUR HOURS for a COVID test, parking lot was half full, but mostly staff. I know they were staff because we also watched half the staff leave during this time, went in and asked how long it would be, they weren’t sure. we kept waiting, turns out a few of the nurses that had left didn’t say anything so nobody else in the staff knew. we had been there since 2pm but it wasn’t until 4:30pm they called to say “we’re just getting you into the system we need your insurance card.” around 6:30 we were tired of waiting (still couldn’t give us a timeframe) and told Them just to take us off of the list we’d come back another day, we got 10 minutes down the road before they called to tell us our room was ready. we said we had already left so they said they were giving our room to the next person then and that was the end of it. I wouldn’t recommend doing anything there unless you’ve got 4-6 hours to spare just to get your nose swabbed.

name: Tiga Heath
text: What’s the point in listing the phone number; when they never answer phone. Service very very slow..

name: Pam K
text: Giving a negative review is not something I take lightly, however, when a person goes to Urgent Care the assumption of being seen in a timely fashion is inherent. I waited for over 2 hours. This is not an exaggeration, but an indisputable fact. I was never seen by the doctor. I asked for my copay to be refunded, and left after being placed in a room for two hours. A person who is very ill and needing immediate care would be well advised to seek treatment elsewhere.

name: justin lober
text: Kinda messed up it's called immediate care. It always takes 4 hours even when they're not busy. Only reason I come here is they take medicare

name: The Luncefords
text: Very fast and efficient, the parking lot was full and I never saw another patient except from the safety of my car so pre planned distancing was flawlessly demonstrated! In and out within 30 minutes!

name: Darlene Hill (DeeDee)
text: I took my daughter to have her tested for covid and was never called back with any results and apparently our insurance was supposed to cover 100% but we were charged a copay and it took way too long for the appointment.

name: Mary Brooke Sims
text: I dont normally leave bad reviews. The staff was very friendly, although the wait time was absolutely ridiculous. Me and my boyfriend waited for 3 hours to be seen by the nurse and weve been waiting now for atleast 30 minutes for the doctor to come in. I understand they are really busy, but we were not told it would take this long.

name: Fred Luhn
text: Don't know what happened here. Used to be a great place to go to get treated. Here almost 5 hours already with 4 kids and STILL no doctor has seen us. They put you in a room and forget you there. Ridiculous.

name: Wanda Capps
text: We got here for Covid 19 testing. Were told they would bring paperwork out to us. Waited half an hour. No one else in the parking lot. They finally brought out paperwork an hour later they call me with questions. I get them answers and still wait and wait. They say they are really busy there are 2 cars in the parking lot and 1 is mine. Been here more than 2 hours and still waiting. People could die from Covid 19 before they can get the test done

name: Muffin the wolf
text: My husband was in Anniston for business and wasn’t feeling well and decided to go to this urgent care. I give a 2 because he said overall the service was fine and in a timely manner but the receptionist was rude. He had to leave abruptly from Anniston and called  to inform them that he needed to have his medicine sent to a pharmacy. She acted like she didn’t understand what he was trying to get her to do then told him it will take 24 hours to get his medicine to our pharmacy.  Called the pharmacy the next day still nothing. Called them back and she was like it  he didn’t say what pharmacy. It would have took a simple phone call to ask him what pharmacy again if that was the case. 3 days later still no medicine. Good thing it wasn’t anything he needed such as a inhaler or something or he would have been in big trouble.

name: Marcus Pettus
text: I could not have had a better experience at an urgent care. Will use from now on! I would like to thank the entire staff for being so kind and courteous to me!

name: Kelly Roberts
text: Extremely nice people

name: Michele Pointer
text: 10 I want to thank y'all so much for your help. From the ladies at the front desk to the Nurse practitioner I was very pleased with your service. I am feeling so much better today and it couldn't have been accomplished without you all there. Once again I thank you. And if I need such service again I will definitely come to you. Sincerely, Renee Pledger I don't want to leave out the lady that took my vitals and administered my injections. She was great too.

name: Caitlin Butler
text: They were really rude and really slow. I waited for 3 hours until I was the last one in the waiting room when I had been there the longest. They called everyone before me even though I was in front. Every person was in and out within the hour while i was just expected to sit and wait

name: David Streip
text:
They won't take checks. I won't be going back.
American Family clinic in Oxford was more than happy to help. They even called me today to see how I am doing.

name: Christopher Ramsey
text: Extremely rude and very unprofessional.  Not at all where you want to go for any type of medical treatment

name: Alabama Trappper
text: Worst place in the county. 3 hours in now and still haven’t seen the doc.

name: Nicole Parry
text: In a world where  quality customer service is hard to find,  these ladies work in one of the most challenging environments, when it comes to dealing with the public,  and they do it with class. They go above and beyond what is required and you do it with smiles. I know the job can't be easy,  but you all are definitely appreciated.

name: Tracy Edwards Brown
text: I went loved the staff and Dr was there 30 mins tops! Best urgent care I have ever been to

name: Jeanie Creswell
text: I prefer Southern Immediate Care over my regular MD.  It's quick, takes care of my family's problems, and seems to always be open.  The Nurse Practitioner there, Connie, is so kind and always seems to know the best treatment options for whatever is ailing us.  I always recommend Southern Immediate Care to my friends and family, and I will continue to use them for my family's needs.

name: Alycen_wonderland
text: Dr Price is a great doctor! He listens to you, and doesn’t try to rush out to see other patients! I will continue to use him!

name: James McCary
text: Was our primary care physician. My fiance went because she felt she was having trouble breathing and thought she might have an uper resperatory infection. Note the entire time we've been going we have never seen a doctor only a nurse practitioner. So without doing any blood work chest x-ray or even proper examination prescribed some antibiotics and steroids. Two weeks later after finishing her prescription started feeling worse. Changed her primary care to another physicians office and went there and was diagnosed with pneumoniae after a chest x-ray. Months later we're sent a bill charging us the full amount for the visit when as her primary care its a 15 co-pay.

name: Krystal Goble
text: Great time and care! The next day my son had an allergic reaction to the medicine that he has had numerous times with no reaction. They were very quick to my call and sent more medicine and steroids to help with no hesitation! Highly recommend!

name: Joanna Gray
text: I gave fast and friendly services at each visit.  My family all go to place.  Recommend to all.

name: Melissa Knee
text: Amazing care. The people were so kind and helpful and did whatever they could to work with me even though my new jobs insurance didnt kick in for another couple of days. Above and beyond care.

name: mike brown
text: Been there a few times and I have taken my daughter there and they have always been quick to get it and very nice and professional staff I would recommend this urgent care to anyone in the area.

name: Nicole Clayton
text: Please do not visit this place! I went and was there for three hours and left with the wrong diagnosis. I waited an hour in the waiting room (which I figured it’d be that way). I was placed in a room at 6:34 PM. Around 6:45, the nurse practitioner came in and asked me a few questions as to why I was there. She told me the nurse would be right in to run a few tests. Thirty minutes later, the practitioner came back to do the tests herself. She said it would only be a few minutes and then we’d go on to do the X-ray. I could hear them in the hallway just chatting.  An HOUR later, I was taken back for the X-ray. I was told I had a gas bubble trapped and she didn’t think it was my gallbladder. She said they would call me the next day for a referral to do an ultrasound to check to be sure it wasn’t gallbladder issues. It’s been two days and still no call. I still was experiencing pain, and I knew it was more than gas pain. Sure enough, I have gallstones which will require surgery to remove my gallbladder. I spent three hours there just to receive the wrong diagnosis. Don’t get me wrong! The staff was friendly, but it’s not worth it!

name: MeMe stricklin
text: The staff is always friendly and very caring. It's never a long wait!!! Continue the great service to the community. We drive approximately 30 mins to be serviced by this facility.

name: Nicole Brown
text: Waited in the waiting room for 3 and a half hours and the entire time I was there 2 people were called back. The place was so full there was nowhere for any new people to sit! I left before lunch time because I wasn't going to sit there for an hour and a half for them to eat.  Don't waste your time here go somewhere else.

name: Waverly Polak
text: I came here to get a physical and had to wait an hour and a half until I finally saw the nurse practitioner, just for her to sign a piece of paper to say I am physically capable of working there. They're very slow.

name: Jacob Burrell
text: Friendly staff. Knowledgeable doctors. In and out as quickly as possible

name: Gretajill Prickett
text: Been here for over 3 hours with my son which feels awful with flu symtoms. I didn't want to click even 1 star but "a less than zero" option isn't available. Place is a joke.

name: Rodger Brothers
text: Got in and out fast. Like the Doctor's practitioner. She was very knowledgeable.

name: Jake Reaper
text: If I could give no stars I would I went up there just to get tested for Covid and I sat there for three hours I ran out of time I had to get a refund and go somewhere else because they were taking too long I saw people come up there before I showed up and they went in the back before me and I was there before them the women there don’t care  will never ever go there again I’d rather die of sickness than going back there again

name: L Y
text: I just moved to the area and randomly picked an urgent care. An additional test was ordered and they said the hospital would be calling me. When a week had past with not one phone call I called to see what was going on. They said oh well the procedure is closed out but we can re open it. What?! So now I have to start all over and go to a new Doctor. I’m giving them two stars because they’re friendly. I don’t recommend.

name: Christina Brown
text: This place is awesome!! The staff is so so nice and the wait is short...been there many times and never had an issue..glad to have them in the community

name: Blah Blahb
text: 4 hours at the time of me writing this, no nurse.

name: Stormie Key
text: Just now leaving and one of the ladies at the front desk rolled her eyes at me and they have a new system so without all of my insurance information I can’t be seen which I don’t bring with me bc it should be on file. I also have had worse experiences before at this place.

name: wendy montoya
text: 10!  Love your friendly staff. Always a pleaent environment! Keep up good work!

name: Marsha Beard
text: I went in the Anniston office about the 2nd week of December with chest pains and breathing problems.  They did ekg and xray and said all was fine but still wanted me to see a cardiologist which Im fine with 2nd opinion, they also did blood work and called me on the 29th od Dec to tell me I was diabetic, which I knew that and it was not only on my paper work but was told in triage, and that my liver enzymes were high and they wanted me to get a sonogram of my liver,  I just got the referral lady to call me with a cardiologist apt a week ago and I have called 3 times about sonogram and she said that she would call me back with an apt by Monday and well today is Friday and still no apt. They may not be worried about my liver but as a diabetic it has had me worried for over a month now. I know Dr Junkins is a good Dr but his staff is giving his office a bad rep. They were all nice but someone isnt doing their job.

name: Tamara Reaves
text: Took real good of my husband and staff n doc was had great experience and they are really caring about there patients

name: Amanda Ball
text: Drove down last night 40 mins away because I developed a high fever and felt awful. I have met my out of pocket expense with my BCBS which means all of my medical expenses are covered at 100%. But they would not listen to me and I even I tried to show them but they wouldn't look at my phone. I have had my insurance for 6 years and know exactly how it works. So waited til morning to come to Doctor's Medcare and get called to the desk and told your out of pocket expense has been met so we will just bill the insurance. I knew what I was talking about! Teach them to learn abouy insurance or to listen to the patient sometimes. And I have no care for anyone to reach out to me.

name: Tiffany Beason
text: Every time we go the staff and drs are great! Highly recommend them!

name: Lorraine Watson
text: This is my second visit and as with the first I receive fast professional in excellent service

name: Jason Hauk
text: My son ,My wife and me was all really sick, We waited an hour in the waiting room just to get told they couldn't see us on a weekend when my dr is closed. But I could pay $100 to see there dr sounds like insurance fraud to me. I wouldn't take my dog to this place.

name: Jason Barnes
text: Great service. A great addition to the community.

name: Katrina Renforth
text: Sat for over 2 hrs while other people came in after my daughter and I got here and were taken back before my daughter was. The staff at front desk are extremely rude, and unprofessional. I wouldn't recommend coming here. Ridiculous how they make you wait, plus had to pay $135 to sit in lobby...

name: Toby Maag
text: Best care. Great staff. Very attentave.

name: Anthony Coley
text: Staff and facility was excellent. Was in and out in an hour with my 5 year.

name: Kathryn Kelley
text: Great staff! Fast, friendly and caring!

name: lacey truett
text: Excellent experience, everyone was friendly and fast service

name: AnDrea Gladden
text: Very friendly staff!!! Great price without insurance, gets you back quick and the doctor is awesome!!!!

name: Brayan Esquivel
text: Great personal I recommend this to anyone

name: Aariel Roberson
text: Good care fast lovable environment

name: Amanda Riker
text: These folks are wonderful!

name: Whitney Ray
text: Matthew Irvin was wonderful!

name: Easy E
text: Currently waiting, been waiting since 9:50am, and it's currently 12:43pm. The worse experience ever. As I was writing this, the doctor finally came in for exactly 2 minutes. Waited another 43 minutes. HORRIBLE !!!!!!.

name: kristy mcdowell
text: Super fast

name: Cheryl Brown
text:
Service was good but tried to contact them about my prescription, by leaving a message and the next day spoke to one of the doctors . I understood that I’d get an additional  medication. He said that he’d check on it and call right back. I’ve had no response to my requests. Very disappointing.
It’s very difficult to get a person through the automated service. I have yet to get through easily.
The menu is very time consuming and frustrating.
The positive is that the doctors were friendly and seemed knowledgeable.

name: Taylor Teel
text: Incredible staff that was very helpful.  They saw us right away, knew that it would require some extra care and attended to our patient very well, making sure that he was well beyond OK before they left.  5 stars.

name: Luanne Heslin
text:
I just returned from MainStreet Family care
! Fantastic care. All of the staff were tops!
Allison,Mariah,Keanna and Teresa went way above
Making a very upsetting visit ok! So professional
And courteous. I will return.
Thank you for everything! 10 stars in my book!

name: Delaine Gibson
text: The staff were extremely nice and helpful. The were pleasant, even at the end of a long 12 or 13 hour day spent helping others. I'm very thankful they were there and treated me with care and respect.

name: Noah Chizanskos
text: Staff did not help elderly couple, who stated that they did not know how to use the tablet for their visitation. My wife helped the couple, as I pictured. Staff at front desk has not batted an eye in their direction. This should be concerning for anyone worried about covid, as the staff handed the tablet over without gloves, the couple used it, and now my wife is using it for the couple. This is a lack of standards.

name: Deb Haze
text: This clinic is like a well oiled machine!  Such a breath of fresh air.  Everyone is extremely kind and professional.  Pam is exceptional at her job and I will continue to come here for care solely because of her.  Well done!

name: Kevin Kennedy
text: Awful! The lady at the front desk was not friendly at all. You have to check in online There is no other alternative for people that may Not be comfortable with using online services. While I was there an older lady came in and said she didn’t know how to use the services and they tried to give her a tablet instead of helping her and said they couldn’t help her. I told the lady that I would help her and then asked for a number to complain and the front Desk host went to the back and got two other employees who came out to me and told me that she wasn’t rude, when she was being rude to me , and then they threaten to call the cops on me when I committed no crime. I would never recommend them to anyone! You go in there not feeling well they are supposed to make you feel good about yourself and treat you. Not put you through more torment!

name: Casey Fuller
text: The online check in and texting process really made my visit enjoyable. I didn’t have to sit and miserably wait in my car or in the lobby for hours. Instead I was able to wait at home and they simply text me when it was close to my time. Lobby was clean and staff was very friendly and helpful.

resp.text: Thank you so much for sharing, Casey! We appreciate you choosing MainStreet Family Care!

name: Mike Parrish
text: I’m pretty sure I have a kidney stone. I registered, paid and waited. And waited. 3 hours later and I noticed several people had been called that arrived after I did. I’d rather be in pain at home. Or if I want to wait 3 hours, I can go to my regular doctor. DO NOT go here unless you have a day to waste.

name: Tannic Blu
text: The Staff Is Very, Very Friendly. My Visit Went Very Well, and Without Any Hassle. I Would Strongly Recommend This Urgent Care Clinic.

name: SarahAnn Southerland
text: Very nice waiting area with refreshments available, however, every time I have gone (3 times), the wait has been hours long. Would not recommend going here if you just want to get it in and get out.

name: Carly Byrd
text: I have been a patient at too many clinics to count. I have never felt more comforted while feeling ill than I did at MainStreet. The extra mile they go to here is unmatched. Free waters, juices, Keurig coffee, even play books and toys for the children! In/Out less than one hour. Highly recommend.

resp.text: We are so happy you had a wonderful experience. Thank you for taking the time to write this review!

name: Shontae McCants
text: I was in a car accident the day before and this Urgent Care gave me the hardest time about seeing me saying I had to go to the ER first. Even though I was told by the paramedics and police officers to go to the Urgent Care. In this day and time who want to go to the ER for a headache! The girl at the front desk left and wouldn’t come back to assist me I end up walking out and going to another urgent care facility. Very unprofessional!

name: Ashley Watson
text: Amazing customer service and care!

name: Belinda Reed
text: Will never go back . 3.5 hour wait. Staff was arrogant wouldn't listen to anything I tried to tell them. BP was elevated tried to explain I have had a lot of stress NP answer was I have a lot of stress but my BP not up.

name: Abigail White
text: The lady at the front desk was nice but I waited 6 minutes at the desk before she was there, I asked for a corona test, stated that I was showing symptoms yesterday and was still told to take a seat in the general waiting area. I proceeded to wait and sit near all of these people for an hour and 45 minutes before having to leave for another appointment, never got the test, i’m really hoping they find a more efficient way to test than using entire rooms for a nose swab when they could just quickly do it so that the other people there don’t potentially get exposed.

name: Kameko McLemore
text: Fast,  friendly service, with VERY minimum wait time! I've been before and I will certainly go back!

name: Bill Dorminy
text: Went early to get a "rapid" test for covid. There were already 30 people in line. 3 hours of standing in the sun with at least another hour before I would get through the door was enough. I knew I would have to wait, but there are numerous ways to offer good customer service and not have people standing in the sun for that long. Obviously customer service is not a concern of this facility.

name: Qiana McMillon
text: I am here this morning and there was a white woman with short blonde hair that was so RUDE to me and my husband. She made us move because we were in “employee parking” with no sign to show that and then she wouldn’t even answer my questions about testing! I would never come back here seeing that I had to drive over an hour to get here and be treated like this!! Management needs to be looking into who they are hiring.

name: Tim Ooten
text: Care by the Medical Staff was good. But I sat in the Lobby for more than 2 hours. Thank God I was not there for nothing urgent. There is no Urgent in the Valley Urgent Care.

name: Jessica Tomas
text: Went in and had a great experience. I was told that we would not get billed for my service after asking multiple times. A few weeks later was greeting with a bill so called the urgent care back and the receptionist/nurse who answered the phone was super rude. Would not recommend.

name: James Pridgen
text: The ladies at the front desk were rude and dismissive. and States that they were too busy to answer the phone. I had driven over an hour to that clinic because they were doing the rapid Covid testing with no appointment needed and when I got there they had signs on the door. I was told that there website had the correct information and when I showed them the information from their website I was told that there is nothing they would do about this. I told them that I had called numerous times and never was able to speak with someone and had I known that this would the case I would have not wasted my time. Then I was told that they were just too busy and didnt have any to answer the phone. I have attempted to contact a Manager with no success. I would not recommend Using this place as in their word are "Just too busy" and they dont even give you a bit of common courtesy.  --

name: Jonathan Hall
text: 6 HOUR WAIT..Showed up first thing in the morning 14th per person and still waited 2 and a half hours in the sun then 3 hours in the waiting room. Employee didn't like someone referring them as0 the DMV and told him to leave and not come back.  She can refuse service. Stating dont go to six flags then. I had to find out my results just so I could go back to work. If I can help it I will never go back again.

name: Anthony Murphy
text: Very nice people and was quick and very professional and made me feel at ease

resp.text: Thank you, Anthony!

name: Ravyn Walton
text: I went In on Monday night 10 minutes before closing with my daughter and the RECEPTIONIST had a very bad attitude kept checking her watch and told me I would have to hurry and get my paperwork done because they are closing in 7 minutes.  So the doctor finally calls us back and she got us in and out very promptly and was accurate and very polite. Told us wait at the front desk for the school excuse. Still checking her time the receptionist finally finished the excuse and calls my baby last name. Sits our excuse on the counter  without saying have Z nice night or anything.  I stated if you dont like your job you should find a new one because people come here sick you know you will have stay until the last patient leaves.

resp.text:
Hi Ravyn,

We really appreciate you reaching out about your experience. That's certainly not the kind of visit we want our patients to have. We will follow up with our staff accordingly. Thank you again for brining this to our attention!

name: corwin heard
text: At Main Street Family Care they are so nice to you and take good care of you. I feel so much better. Thanks to them

resp.text: Thank you for sharing Corwin! We appreciate you choosing MainStreet Family Care!

name: Tara Bryan
text: Went in this morning feeling terrible! The staff were great and I felt like Doctor Allison Strickland genuinely cared for me and how I felt. Offered me treatments no other doctor has before..... definitely recommend them!!!!! Keep up the great work Mainstreet Urgent Care!!!

resp.text: Thank you so much, Tara! We are so happy that you received everything you needed!

name: Tabitha Truitt
text: I took my son on New Year's Eve and as expected it was busy.  The reception area was clean and the exam room was clean. The Nurse Practitioner we saw was very nice. However, the receptionist that spoke with us as we came in greeted us by telling us how long the wait would be and what she would need to check us in. No hello or welcome. This was in a tone that was clipped and fast. Now it may have been her idea of an efficient greeting, not mine.  Every question asked was met with this same snappy tone. I also was not impressed with the nurse assisting either. No one wants to work on a holiday, so don't. But, if you have to, accept it and do a good job.

resp.text: Hi Tabitha! We appreciate you sharing your thoughts. This is not the typical MainStreet experience we strive for and your concerns will be addressed. Thank you for the compliments and we hope your son is feeling better fast!

name: Mary Willaims
text: From out of town and my friend has COPD. We called to find out what time they closed and was told 8. So we load up, arrive only to be told and I quote....."it's a minute til 8 we're closed".........my friend explained and was told "you can go to the hospital" with NO concern NO CARE in her voice at all. There was no one in the lobby, parking lot empty....so beware they do NOT CLOSE AT 8 THEY CLOSE BEFORE 8

name: Tyronica Marshall
text: Took my daughter in running a fever. Receptionist is rude and clearly prejudiced. We walked in first and she sent couple of different race back first. Btw...I'm African American. Never again will I take my child back. Lady came to front apologizing after I heard their conversation from the back. Apology was not sincere. Beware of the RACISM!!! Only gave 2 stars bc they took her back after the lies...

resp.text:
Hi Tyronica,

We appreciate you reaching out with your concerns! We'd love to be able to follow up, and if you have a minute, would you mind emailing us at info@mainstreetfamilycare.com with your daughter's name and DOB so we can review her chart? Please be sure to include any other specifics about your visit and interactions with the staff. The way our system works is that we pull patients back in order of when we get their completed intake form, not necessarily who walks in the door first. Regardless, our leadership team will look into this. Thank you again for contacting us and providing us with your feedback!

name: Craig Waters
text: Love this place

name: Michelle T
text: I came to this place to see about an issue I was having at 8:38am on a Saturday morning.  The receptionist was rude and ignorant. If you can get past Becky at the front desk then you will be fine. The rest of my experience was fine. Rated a 3 because of the receptionists stupidity.

name: Debra Wilson
text: Nice place,  clean. Staff very helpful and kind. I would go back or recommend them to others. They are all very young and have some things to learn abt patients but to me they were very efficient.  The only real problem is getting someone on the phone. Maybe they are very busy. But I think they do a very good job.

name: Ambriah Howard
text: Great experience and the Staff was very caring. Did not have to wait long either which is always a plus!

name: Lindsey O'Steen Doughman
text: It all depends on who’s working. I have had a five star experience here and I’ve also had a negative star experience here.

resp.text: Lindsey, we're sorry that we missed the mark with your experience this time. We strive to provide consistency. We'll be sure to meet with our team so we can provide you the experience you deserve--each and every visit!

name: Sherrad Hayes
text:
This office does a great job!!!
I've had some real bad experiences with places like this in the past but the professionals in this office are super. I have no complaints and highly recommend them.

resp.text: Thank you so much Sherrad! We try to help every patient heal and feel better, FAST! We appreciate you choosing MainStreet Family Care!

name: Jenna Brown
text: We also had a very positive experience at Main Street!  The facility is new, spacious, and clean with extra touches like free coffee, water and juice in the waiting area.  Staff was kind and service was quick.  They were so good with my son!

resp.text: Thank you so much for taking the time to share these kind words! We hope your son is healing better and feeling better FAST!

name: Alana Stewart
text: I went to Main Street Urgent Care for a severe cough. I did not have any other symptoms except for the cough but went because I didn't want to be constantly coughing at work and Dayquil wasn't helping anymore. I left with out any real diagnosis and a prescription for an antibiotic and a cough medicine. The cough medicine had absolutely no effect and after finishing to round of antibiotics there was no change in my cough and it has only gotten worse. I called up there to see if they could potentially reexamine me. Unlike every other urgent care that I have ever been to they told me I would be charged a copay to be reexamined. If I had known this was their policy I would have gone to an urgent care in Auburn like I usually do as they care more about me getting better than me paying a copay and don't charge one for reexaminations. They did call in a new cough medicine prescription however it is a decongestant even though I have absolutely no congestion symptoms. It was also not covered by my insurance so I was forced to pay out of pocket. I will not be returning to this urgent care in the future. In my opinion it is worthwhile to drive to the Auburn area to see a doctor that can actually diagnose me and make sure I leave happy and healthy.

resp.text: We are sorry to hear that you didn't have a positive experience, that is certainly not our goal or intention. We always strive to treat everyone like family and our patient's health is always the first priority.

name: Angie Higgins
text: omgggg what an amazing experience my daughter and I had. I actually felt important and not just "another patient". We received great service from the moment we entered the door by the receptionist to the very back. The young lady who assisted us (Tikerah) was very kind, gentle and patient with my baby. I would definitely recommend!

resp.text: Thanks so much Angie! ❤️❤️

name: Jen Evans
text: T.Brock was extremely sweet and nice! I went in on a Sunday and got out within no time would definitely recommend this place.

name: Zane Everitt
text: Great service. In and out in less than an hour. Everyone was very nice. The rooms were clean and complimentary coffee and water were a bonus. Definitely recommend this facility!

resp.text: Thank you so much for taking the time to share these kind words! We hope your son is healing better and feeling better FAST!

name: Felisha Mccullough
text: Paid $30.00 on a test was told to come back an get the results went back for the result I was told It was to late because a miss understanding of the time and date( Ididn't get my results of the test and they refuse to give me my money back and said I have to pay another $ 30.00 for another test really I don't think so)

resp.text: Hi, Felisha. We'd like to learn more about your experience and see if we can help clear this up. Would you mind emailing us at info@mainstreetfamilycare.com with your contact information? We look forward to speaking with you.

name: Megan Coggins
text: 2 months ago, I would have given 5 stars; However, 2 days ago, one of the nurses in the clinic refused to treat me. He said that they would see me, but wouldn’t send in any medications because of me being pregnant. I was very disappointed because I was also pregnant 2 months ago when I had the flu and was given a prescription by the same providers. Thankfully, the Urgent Care in Opelika doesn’t discriminate against pregnant people. Will definitely tell everyone not to go here.

resp.text: Hi Megan, we appreciate you taking the time to reach out to us. Pregnancy can certainly make getting the right treatment/prescription difficult, and we certainly attempt to do all that we can for every patient. I would love to get more feedback from your visit. If you could, give me a call at 205-739-4876 or you can reach me by email at AJames@Mainstreetfamilycare.com.

name: Chancy Rudd
text: This place is awesome!!! I took my wife in for stitches. The staff was extremely friendly and helpful. We were in and out very quickly and we received exceptional care. I definitely recommend MainStreet Family Urgent Care.

resp.text: Thanks, Chancy! We're glad you had a great experience, and we appreciate you choosing MainStreet Family Urgent Care!

name: Nicole T Tansmore
text: No one never answers the phone or calls you back.😔

name: Elizabeth Abner
text: I am feeling so much better. This is my second visit. Everyone was nice and kind.

resp.text: Thank you for the 5 star review! We're glad you're feeling better!

name: Calan Ray
text: I received great from Tikerah and the entire staff. Tikerah was so nice and helpful.

resp.text: Thanks Calan!

name: jeff carter
text: Very positive experience, short wait time. Katherine Gamper was physician that saw me and she was very professional and diagnosed my situation. Again very pleased with the service.

resp.text: We are so happy you had a wonderful experience. Thank you for taking the time to write this review! We agree that Katherine is one of the best!

name: Kimberly Rose
text: The staff here is amazing! They were willing to help any way possible and the wait time was not long at all!

resp.text: We are so happy you had a wonderful experience. Thank you for taking the time to write this review!

name: outshined72 (kimmyshimmy72)
text: I wasted my time going there. I was having a bad time after a flu shot. There was a tech who felt the need the need to diagnose me in the waiting room and the NP came to the door and basically made me feel like an idiot. Good job folks.

name: Ashley H
text: By far the best doctor place I have been to. I've been sick alot, and I went to the hospital twice and they did nothing & didn't prescribe me any antibiotics or anything. Even the regular doctors that I have been to down here, they just tried to get me in and out and didn't listen to the ssymptoms that I told them that I was having. I love all of the doctors and it is the best place to go if your sick

resp.text: Thank you so much for taking the time to share these kind words! We hope you are healing better and feeling better FAST!

name: Alicia slaughter
text: I really appreciate the fast and friendly staff

resp.text: Thanks so much Alicia!

name: Mike James
text: great clinic. In and out in no time. courteous staff

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to review our clinic! We're glad to had a great experience :)

name: Jody Walker
text: Exactly what Urgent Care was designed to be. Friendly and helpful staff with a genuine concern for my well-being.

resp.text: Thanks so much for the kind words Jody! This is exactly the experience we hope to deliver to every patient!

name: Anne Smith
text: They were very nice and kind, l went there for severe pain from sciatic nerve flare up, l could barely walk because of the pain that was on the 18th, today lm walking, thank you Dr. Nicole Groover for knowing how to help me!!!!

resp.text: Thank you for sharing Anne! So glad we could help you feel better, FAST!

name: Sherika Scott
text: This is the best thing to happen to Valley, Al as far as doctors go! Their building is nice and clean. They have complimentary water/juices/coffee. They even have other snack items that you can purchase. The wait time is short. The receptionist is very caring and understanding. The nurses are nice and friendly. The doctor seemed to be good. And they even have a treasure chest for the kids after their appointment is over. They accept medicaid unlike most urgent care centers which is caring in itself! But best of all these wonderful people actually do a follow up call to check on you 2 to 3 days after your visit and even if everything is going well they ask you to call back if anything changes. I can honestly say i love them!!! Laneir Hospital sucks (negligent and life threatning misdiagnosis', rude, long wait) -please avoid them and make mainstreet your place for emergency health issues! I now know they are indefinitely mine 😊

resp.text: Thank you so much Sherika! We're glad you had a great experience! We appreciate you choosing MainStreet Family Urgent Care!

name: Bob Gay
text: Great staff, Great service. Recommend to anyone in need of fast and friendly service.

resp.text: We are so happy you had a wonderful experience! Thank you for taking the time to write this review!

name: Mandy Cain
text: The establishment was very clean. The receptionist was very rude going in and leaving. The nurse or tech (not sure what she was) was extremely rude. They put me in a room, she came in and talked to me then told me the provider would be on the screen shortly and I could explain my condition to the provider. I was completely confused - she wouldn't explain anything to me. I had to finally get firm and say please explain to me what a provider will be!!! She said the Dr will be on the screen and you will see the dr by internet. I said NO I will not agree to that. I came here to see a Dr not a screen!!! She was so expressionless and had zero personality. No bedside manner at all!!!!! Very Rude!!! She was shocked I wanted to see a live provider -i said NO I want to see a DR. in person!!! Then she said a live provider would be in soon. I felt like I was in a science fiction movie!!! IT was very awkward and confusing. If I had not waited forever to get back there I would have walked out!!! The DR finally came in and I expressed my concerns. She apologized and told me she was very sorry and she understood my confusion and my concerns. She was very very nice!!! Then the nurse or tech (what ever she was other than very rude) came back in and gave me a shot and told me to walk out front to the lobby and wait on my meds. That is all she said and walked out!!! I went back to the lobby and sat down. I was in there going on another 30 minutes and asked the receptionist if my meds would be ready soon. She was very rude!!! IT was the holidays BUT you it is your job!!! I could have drove to Stop Watch in Opelika and been out for the time it took me at this establishment and received much better care!!! I do not suggest anyone to take time out of their day to see this establishment!!!!

resp.text:
Hi Mandy,

Thank you for reaching out and providing feedback about your visit. We apologize that your experience was not satisfactory, and we will be following up with our staff. Can you tell me the date of your visit? We are always striving to improve, and I hope we’ll have another opportunity to help you feel better FAST!

name: Debbie Wood
text: Great facility.  Katie is professional and  diagnosed my problem in a timely manner.  I received a follow up call to see how I was feeling.

resp.text: We are so happy you had a wonderful experience! Thank you so much for taking the time to write this review!

name: Taylor Harper
text: Cna that took my vitals was very rude . Asked her if I could bring my sister back and she said no it’s a hippa violation . I’ve never heard that in my life and working as a nurse I know that doesn’t break the hippa code . Once I insisted that I want my sister in the back with me no if ands or buts , she calls the girl at the front desk and starts to gossip about me and my sister wanting to be together in the room . I don’t see the big deal . Someone really needs to retrain the whole place cause nobody seems to know wth they are doing .

resp.text:
Hi Taylor
We are so sorry to hear about your unsatisfactory experience.  We are looking into it and someone will be contacting you to further discuss your visit. We appreciate your feedback and I hope we can win you back sometime in the future.

name: E'Lexis Edmonson
text: Tikerah was very kind and made my experience better than any other time I have visited.

name: Regina Moore
text: Today I was treated for a sore on my mouth and was prescribed a medicine that i have already tried that was over the counter. I will go to my physician next time. I am not please at all.

resp.text: Hi Regina! I'm sorry your experience at MainStreet was less than a 5 star experience. I'd love to speak with you more about it if you could give me a call at 205-739-4876.

name: Keyal Loveland
text: Clean, friendly, with organic coffees/teas/juice in the lobby. They even have blankets in case you get cold. It's the little things!

resp.text:
We are so happy you had a wonderful experience. We agree about the “little things” meaning so much!
Thank you for taking the time to write this review!

name: Joy Robinson
text: I was very sick went in the young lady up front was very kind get to the back the and one of the Techs that came in to give me a shot was very rude I reported her right then only she knew I was about to report her actions so she spoke to the person in charge ahead of me trying to justify her actions this is not a free clinic and people come because they are sick and need help Quickly my blood pressure was up and I had a sinus infection / cold and I was treated very rude and when I addressed it it wasn't taken serious this happened Sep 25 ,2017  after waiting almost 2hrs to be seen because of them being full

resp.text: We are sorry to hear that you didn't have a positive experience, that is certainly not our goal or intention. We always strive to treat everyone like family and our patient's health is always the first priority.

name: Roniegus Lyons
text: I had insurance but they still wouldn't see me because I didn't have 60$ Co pay. I could have died

resp.text: Hi Roniegus, I apologize you had a less than excellent experience. Unfortunately we don't determine how much your co-pay is, but just go by what your insurance company requires for an Urgent Care visit. Though in any emergency situation, you would want to seek out the closest Emergency Room as Urgent Care isn't intended for most emergency situations. If you would like to discuss this further you can reach me by phone at 205-739-4876.

name: Danny w
text: Most screwed up place I've ever seen.

resp.text: Hi Danny, I apologize that you had a bad experience at our clinic. I would love to hear more about your visit. If you would, please give me a call at 205-739-4876.

name: Jackie White
text: Nice and friendly staff

resp.text: Thanks, Jackie! We hope you feel better fast! Thank you for choosing MainStreet Family Urgent Care!

name: cory adams
text: waiting times are very long. even when not busy. covid-19 tests require medical insurance and $125 fees not negotiable. I highly recommend anywhere else for covid tests.

name: John Blair
text: My son fell yesterday and messed his chin up pretty bad and upon entering main street urgent care we were told since they closed in 6 minutes they couldnt help. The doctor was rude about it. I thought that if it was an emergency no matter what time they closed they were supposed to help. But evidently hes just in it for money instead of actually helping people. Sorriest service ever.

name: Brian Tilton
text: Awesome people! I had to travel a long way to get their services and they were very busy, but pleasant and WELL ORGANIZED. Each staff person I met with was very nice, relaxed and thorough. I got to wait in my car for my own space and peace of mind. I HIGHLY RECOMMEND them and will not hesitate to use them again. Thank you for the great experience, it's very hard to find that in the health care industry today.

name: Tammie Dortch
text: My Husband tested Positive for Covid and the next day my daughter and I became sick.  We drove 40 minutes to this walk-in clinic to get the rapid test only to find out they’ve “reached their limit for testing today.”  So does this mean the PANDEMIC is over??  Or is it not as bad as we’ve been told?  I guess I can just go about my daily routine.  If there’s a limit for how many people can be tested, it must not be such a big deal after all.  Thanks for clearing it up!

name: William Covan
text: Been up here waiting for 4 hours now and there is only 2 other people in the parking lot so why is it taking so long to get seen...id be better off going to the ER at least id get seen faster and get out

name: Jamison Ingram
text: This place refused to test me for covid-19 because I don't have a Credit Card or a bank account. Regardless of insurance paying for everything. The next clinic that offer's testing is over 60 miles away. How can "health clinics" be aloud to be so discriminating?

name: chicken lady
text:
My husband and I recently visited Mainstreet urgent care on December 22 for the Covid 19 testing. We had the best experiance possible. The CRNP Troy Wilcoxson was awesome! We told our friends about what a great experiance we had, and recommended the establishment to others.
So today, December 23 I took my daughter back to get tested for Covid 19, since our test were positive.
In my 48 years I have only experienced two other so called CRNP's as bad as the Donna Conway treated me today.
She bad mouthed Mr. Wilcoxson in how he practices and the decisions he makes. I pleaded to her to change my daughters prescription over to what my husband and I were taking which is not against the law nothing illegal and she could have totally made me feel better as mother and understand ultimately I know my daughter best, she is not just a math equation.
Everything I said to her she used words like "debunked", when I am the paying customer.
I was shocked.
Just because what I was requesting did not fall into her agenda and I pleaded with her, she chose not to make me assured as a parent my daughter is getting  the right treatment. Not to mention she wrote my daughter for an inhailer and no one even listened to her lungs. Using an inhailer when you don't need it can cause more damage than good.
After I stated that fact, she then listened to my daughters lungs and said she sounded clear.
I am so appalled by her lack of bedside manner and inability to connect with the concerns and needs of the patients.
On our previous visit we were invited to sign the kiosk about our experience. Today Donna Conway made sure to skip that option. When I asked the front desk receptionist to please load the kiosk for me it only allowed me to enter 1 as my satisfaction, when I went type the reason why, someone conveniently shut it off and the receptionist could not reload it.
So there's that.
If this Donna Conway continues to be employed at your establishment, I will make it my daily mission to make sure through ALL of my media connections that people call first and only visit the Care Center when Troy is working.

name: Theresa Cahoon
text: I was very sick on October 30th. They were not seeing patients because their internet was down!  Today, I gave them another chance and the receptionist shoved a paper at me to go register on-line.  My phone doesn't work well. I wish another company would buy this place out so we could receive care! It's ashame. This used to be an efficient place with good staff.

name: Rodney Butts
text: Came in on Saturday 7/11/2020 , with sciatica so bad I couldn't sit down . I had been holding myself up on crutches for hours . I got there 20 minutes before they opened at 9. When the guy opened the door he went to the line of people wanting covid testing and began calling names. I told him that I was hurting real bad and needed a shot. He said that I should come back after lunch.  I replied that I am in a lot of pain and need a shot. He told me that these people need a swab . No compassion for pain. It was obvious that he hasn't had any real pain before.  I made it to the emergency room at DWM and they got me in right away.  I have used mainstreet before but I will not in the future.  When you put test before pain you have lost your mind in my opinion.  Testing won't last forever.

name: Tammy Gibson
text: My husband and I both have been ,and are very pleased with their service ,very friendly and professional

name: Lisa Driggers
text: Wait is terrible with hardly no one even in the waiting room. They over charge on everything. They don’t properly bill insurance companies so you’re left having to deal with getting it properly taken care of, in the mean time their billing people threaten to send you to collections for non payment ALL BECAUSE THEY COULDN’T BILL INSURANCE PROPERLY THE FIRST TIME. Will not go back.

resp.text:
Hi Lisa,

Thank you for reaching out about your experience. We'd like the opportunity to follow up on your account, but I'm having a tough time finding you in our system. Would you please email us at info@mainstreetfamilycare.com with your name and DOB? Also, our billing team would be more than happy to review your claim and fix any issues! The billing phone number is 256-854-9989. Please don't hesitate to let us know what we can do to help make this right for you, and again we want to thank you for bringing this to our attention.

name: Sandatmyfeet
text: Hospitality at its greatest. Front desk clerk super nice and helpful. Very clean place. In and out in no time. Nurse Practitioner/MD was very personable and knowledgeable. The Nurse or aide that done the vitals could be a little more talkative and explanatory. Overall good experience.

resp.text: Thank you so much for your kind words! So glad we could help you heal and feel better, FAST!

name: Leah Blalock
text: This place is amazing!!! They were fast, extremely friendly, and even have medications on sight! Will definitely be recommending everyone I know to them!

name: Castle Clan Gunn Castle Clan Gunn
text: From a medical professiona new to town, this place won't ever be getting a second visit from this nurse. They are "smoke steaming off a hot terd" slow and unprofessional. I was second in line when the door opened and still had to sit for an hour and a half while seven other patients were called ahead of me because the staff didn't know how to enter my information into the computer system. I was sick as dog and couldn't even get a Dr excuse for one day!! I guess they know how we are all feeling on the inside!!
